about.title: Software Developer
about.aboutText: Hi welcome to this page! I am Jimf Bocales, a passionate software developer with expertise in JavaScript, Python, VS Code, Git, and modern web frameworks. I build robust, scalable applications and deliver clean, maintainable code for diverse business needs.

pitch: With a strong foundation in software engineering and technology, I approach every project with a problem-solving mindset, a willingness to collaborate, and a drive for innovation. If youâ€™re looking for someone who values clean code, teamwork, and delivering robust solutions, I would be honored to be part of your journey.
